channel.title: I tryed yesterday no help lets try again
channel.description:
Whenev i try and compile that happens but in my enviormental varialbes i have
CLASSPATH
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
PATH
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
But it still does this i have the new download 7 but it still wont work some help please?
this is wut my compiler says [code] @echo off title Compiler javac *.java pause [code/][/code]

item.title: I tryed yesterday no help lets try again
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:2, topic:227609”]@echo off title Credits To Hasumon color 08 echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo [FastVersion] Thank You for using Hasumon's compiler! echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo Compiling... Please Wait... echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) echo You do not have any JDK/Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo Source has been compiled... echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo If you have 1 or more errors, you need to fix those to compile correctly! echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ pause exit
Better using that… i take no credit for the .bat[/quote]

There literally is no need for that, just use this;

@echo off COLOR 03 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Read full topic
item.source: I tryed yesterday no help lets try again

item.title: I tryed yesterday no help lets try again
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

@echo off title Credits To Hasumon color 08 echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo [FastVersion] Thank You for using Hasumon's compiler! echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo Compiling... Please Wait... echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) echo You do not have any JDK/Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo Source has been compiled... echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ echo If you have 1 or more errors, you need to fix those to compile correctly! echo ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ pause exit
Better using that… i take no credit for the .bat
